Experience

CDSN Lab

M.S. Program

2021 - Present

http://cds.kaist.ac.kr/

As a master student, I studyed IoT-based smart service. The main research point was RL-based preference learning system in IoT-enriched space; system that captures user’s personalized preference from interaction between user and space, and provides user preferable environmental state. In addtion, I adopted the mobile service robot as a tool to increase the space intelligence for capturing more accurate user preference.
